msgSnippet: Hi, I would like to announce JsUnit 1.1 a port of JsUnit 3.2 to JavaScript. Main goal of the port is a system that can be invoked by command line returning

Hi,

I would like to announce JsUnit 1.1 a port of JsUnit 3.2 to JavaScript=
. Main goal of the port is a system that can be invoked by command line ret=
urning with an exit code to allow automated tests as long as the environmen=
t support this scenario. Despite the command line tools the port supports a=
lso common browsers that have exceptions for JavaScript implemented.

Curre=
ntly tested systems:
- Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.x and 5.x
- Windows Sc=
ripting Host 2.x
- Visual InterDev 6.0
- iPlanet WebServer 4.x
- Netscape 6=
.x
- Mozilla 0.8x and 0.9x
- Rhino 1.5
- SpiderMonkey 1.5

Systems that are=
 supposed to work:
- BroadVision OneToOne 5.x
- IIS 5.x

Systems that curre=
ntly fail due to their implementations:
- KDE Konqueror 0.9.8
- Day Communi=
qu=E9 2.6
- Opera 5.12 (Windows)
- Netscape 4.7x
- iPlanet Web Server 6.x (=
JavaScript support dropped)

Check out at http://jsunit.berlios.de

Regards=
,
J=F6rg
subject: [Announcement] JsUnit 1.1 released
